name: AWS - Create a group and add a user to that group
description: Adversaries create AWS group, add users to specific to that group to elevate their privilieges to gain more accesss

data.command:
aws iam create-group --group-name #{username}
aws iam add-user-to-group --user-name #{username} --group-name #{username}

aws iam remove-user-from-group --user-name #{username} --group-name #{username}
aws iam delete-group --group-name #{username}

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Check if the user exists, we can only add a user to a group if the user exists.

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: Check if the user exists, we can only add a user to a group if the user exists.

data.command: echo Please run atomic test T1136.003, before running this atomic test

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Check if the user exists, we can only add a user to a group if the user exists.

input_arguments.name: username
input_arguments.description: Name of the AWS group to create
